New Records: Quinton de Kock scored 174, the highest individual score in the tournament so far
South Africa achieved the highest team score of 382
Key Match Events: South Africa won the match by 149 runs
Pre-Game Insights: South Africa aimed for a semi-final spot
De Kock planned to quit ODIs after the World Cup
Post-Match Reflections: De Kock's performance was a memorable farewell
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bangladesh moved up the table on net run rate
